channel.title: Aro on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Aro on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Red Hat OpenShift is now available in Malaysia West, New Zealand North, and Mexico Central
item.description:
Azure Red Hat OpenShift (ARO) is now generally available in three additional Azure regions: Malaysia West, New Zealand North, and Mexico Central.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: OpenShift Virtualization now available on Azure Red Hat OpenShift
item.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Virtualization is now generally available on Azure Red Hat OpenShift (ARO), enabling customers to run and manage virtual machines and containers from a single cloud-native platform. The GA release builds on feedback from the preview announced at Red Hat Summit.

  • Source: Azure Updates
